competitors.name: Vonage (Nexmo)
competitors.notes: Early cloud communications provider, later acquired Nexmo API platform

competitors.name: Traditional Telecom Carriers
competitors.notes: AT&T, Verizon and other carriers provided basic telephony services but lacked developer-friendly APIs

competitors.name: Tropo (Cisco)
competitors.notes: Early cloud communications API platform, later acquired by Cisco

context: Twilio Inc. is a cloud communications platform company focused on programmable communications, SMS, voice, and customer data. Founded for cloud communications APIs.
